price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߲ ߘߐ߫ ߣߊߟߏ߲ߡߊ߫ (ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߐ߲ߓߊߟߌ ) ߟߋ߫ ߕߘߍ߬ ߥߎߦߊ߫ ߝߎ߮ ߝߐ߫ ߟߴߊߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
